title: 【K中A館閉館公告】因颱風來襲K中A館自113年9/30(一)起暫時閉館
content:
分類： 其他公告
來源： 教學卓越中心 - 陳小姐 - sian@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話5846
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 【K中A館閉館公告】因颱風來襲K中A館自113年9/30(一)起暫時閉館
日期： Mon, 30 Sep 2024 15:21:29 +0800

【K中A館閉館公告】因颱風來襲K中A館自113年9/30(一)起暫時閉館

一、中颱山陀兒持續進逼台灣，中央氣象署今清晨2時30分發布海上陸上颱風警報。花蓮縣政府公告今晚全縣停班停課。
二、為保障各位同學之安全，K中A館自113年9/30(一)起暫時閉館。K中A館確切開放時間視情況而定，本中心會再另行公告開館通知。
感謝大家的配合，請各位同學注意自身安全。

教學卓越中心 敬啟

[K-Book Center A Closure Notice] Due to the approaching typhoon, K-Book Center A will be temporarily closed starting Monday, September 30, 2024.

  1. Typhoon Krathon is continuing to approach Taiwan. The Central Weather Administration issued a sea and land typhoon warning at 2:30 AM today. The Hualien County Government has suspended work and classes throughout the county starting tonight.

  2. To ensure the safety of all students, K-Book Center A will be temporarily closed from Monday, September 30, 2024. The exact reopening time will depend on the situation, and an official announcement will be made regarding the reopening once conditions are safe.

Thank you for your cooperation. Please stay safe.

Best regards,
Center for Teaching Excellence
